description: Taj Lake Palace in Udaipur is a property that offers a royal experience with impeccable hospitality. The property is situated in the middle of Lake Pichola and offers breathtaking views. The staff is courteous and goes above and beyond to make guests feel special.
The Leela celebrates each hotel through its unique location, art, culture and cuisine with thoughtful services, celebratory rituals, and immersive experiences.
The Oberoi Udaivilas is a 5-star hotel in Udaipur, India that's known for its romantic setting on Lake Pichola. It's built on the former hunting grounds of the Maharana of Mewar.

Rambagh Palace, Jaipur has a stately elegance that has long made it a much cherished destination. Celebrated restaurants and iconic grounds bestow the 'Jewel of Jaipur' with an added measure of grandeur.
Explore authentic Rajasthan with a luxury stay at The Oberoi Rajvilas, a 5 star hotel in Jaipur just 30 mins drive from the Airport.

The JW Marriott Jaipur Resort & Spa is a luxury hotel in Rajasthan that combines traditional architecture with modern amenities. The resort is set in the Aravalli hills and is close to palaces like Amber Fort and Jal Mahal.
Wildflower Hall, An Oberoi Resort is one of the best resorts in Shimla that offers snowfall views, a swimming pool, luxury accommodations & more.
The Imperial New Delhi is a luxury hotel in New Delhi, India that's known for its elegant architecture, notable art collection, and exceptional service.
Luxury accommodation, signature cuisines & exceptional amenities make ITC Grand Chola, Chennai, one of the world's best 5-star hotels.
An iconic location at the Gateway of India, with sweeping views over the Arabian Sea and access to palace wing facilities.
The Oberoi Grand is a 5-star hotel in Kolkata, India that's known for its heritage charm, elegant decor, and world-class dining.

The Four Seasons Hotel Mumbai is a luxury hotel in Worli, Mumbai, India. It has a rooftop bar and restaurant, an outdoor pool, a spa, and a fitness center. The hotel is known for its attentive service and spacious rooms.
An authentic luxury palace in the heart of Jaipur originally built in 1745 and set amidst eighteen acres of landscaped gardens, with artful rooms and themes.
An exquisite ode to Rajasthan, this 235-year-old warrior fort captures the richness of Bishangarh's culture and the profound sense of peace.
The Ritz-Carlton is a pinnacle of luxury hospitality and will forever remain in history with its iconic logo, passionate Ladies and Gentlemen, world-class service and references in pop culture.

Marriott International Inc (Marriott) is a hospitality service provider that operates hotels and restaurants. It operates, franchises, and licenses hotels, residential, and timeshare properties under several luxury, premium, and select brand names.
The Park Hyatt Chennai is a 5-star hotel in Chennai, India with spacious rooms and suites, a rooftop infinity pool, and a spa. The hotel also has a restaurant, gym, and event space.
The JW Marriott Mumbai Sahar is a 5-star hotel in Andheri East, Mumbai, India. It's located near the airport and business hubs.
Nestled along Juhu Beach, JW Marriott Mumbai Juhu is a five-star haven where luxury reigns supreme. Upscale comfort awaits at our Mumbai beach hotel.

The Oberoi, New Delhi is a 5-star luxury hotel in the center of New Delhi, India. It's known for its hospitality and views of the city and Delhi Golf Club. The hotel has multiple restaurants, a spa, a pool, and a rooftop bar.

The Leela Palace Jaipur is a luxury hotel in Jaipur, Rajasthan, India. It's known for its blend of modern luxury and traditional Indian opulence. The hotel is set against the Aravalli Hills and has landscaped gardens.
The Conrad Bengaluru is a 24-story luxury hotel in Bangalore's Central Business District. It has views of Ulsoor Lake, and is known for its elegant rooms, multiple restaurants, and large event space.
Taj Bengal is an Indian luxury hotel in Kolkata, operated by the Taj Hotels and designed by American architect Bob Fox.
Evolve Back Kabini is a luxury resort in Karnataka, India, located on the banks of the Kabini River. It's a popular destination for wildlife enthusiasts and nature lovers.
Suryagarh Jaisalmer is a 5-star hotel in Jaisalmer, Rajasthan, India. It's a golden sandstone fortress that combines contemporary amenities with the rich history of Rajasthan.

The ITC Maratha, a Luxury Collection Hotel is a 5-star hotel in Mumbai, India. It's close to the airport and has a variety of restaurants, a spa, and a gym. The hotel is known for its warm hospitality and impeccable service.
Radisson Blu hotels attract the traveler seeking a stay that combines style with substance, innovation with comfort and a sense of belonging in an elevated environment.
Revel in award-winning dining and spa amenities, accompanied by the unparalleled Taj service you would anticipate from a 5-star hotel in Bengaluru.
Discover the new Radisson Kufri situated in the foothills of the Himalayas. Enjoy spectacular views, comfortable and stylish rooms, and on-site dining.
Hotel Chanoud Garh is a 300-year-old palace in the village of Chanoud, Rajasthan. It's a family-run hotel that offers a unique glimpse into local life.
